description:
http://anidb.net/ch7247 [Saotome Ranma] and his father, http://anidb.net/ch7339 [Genma], fell into cursed springs during a journey to China. As a result, whenever Ranma comes into contact with cold water, he turns into a girl; when the same thing happens to Genma, he becomes a panda. Wheneven that happens, they stay in their alternative form until the process is reversed by hot water. And if that wasn`t bad enough, Ranma has a bigger problem to deal with: his father and http://anidb.net/ch7371 [Tendou Souun] decide to marry Ranma to the youngest daughter of the Tendou household, http://anidb.net/ch7338 [Akane], so that the two can eventually take over her family`s dojo. Meanwhile, the youngsters are less than thrilled about this forced engagement...
Note: http://anidb.net/a4576 [Ranma 1/2] was canceled due to poor ratings, and was taken off the air to be retooled. It was relaunched as Ranma 1/2 Nettou Hen with some changes in staff. Furthermore, the US release shuffled the episodes around to bring it more in line with the manga.
Note 2: The aired timeline differs from the timeline that was originally intended for this and http://anidb.net/a4576 [Ranma 1/2]. The intended order for the episodes to be viewed is: http://anidb.net/a4576 [Ranma 1/2] 1-13, http://anidb.net/a193 [Ranma 1/2 Nettou Hen] 7-9, http://anidb.net/a4576 [Ranma 1/2] 14-18, http://anidb.net/a193 [Ranma 1/2 Nettou Hen] 1-6, http://anidb.net/a193 [Ranma 1/2 Nettou Hen] 10-End

REGULAR.description: Kaori arrives, insisting that she`s Ranma`s fiancee. To resolve the dispute, Akane and Kaori will compete in the martial arts takeout race, which has a prize of a year`s supply of ramen.

titles.title: Clash of the Delivery Girls! The Martial Arts Takeout Race
激突! 出前格闘レース

REGULAR.description: The Tendos discover that Ranma is terrified of cats. Genma explains the rigorous training of Ranma for the Cat Fist technique. When Ranma becomes a cat, who can snap him out of it?
The beginning of the four-part phoenix pill story. Cologne arrives. Shampoo shows up with a curse of her own. Ranma faces Cologne, and gets poked with her staff.

titles.title: This Ol` Gal`s the Leader of the Amazon Tribe!

REGULAR.description: Ranma can`t change back to a guy, due to Cologne`s pressure-point move. Cologne shows Ranma a technique which could lead to a cure.

titles.title: Behold! The "Chestnuts Roasting on an Open Fire" Technique
出た! 必殺天津甘栗拳!!

REGULAR.description: Mousse challenges Ranma over Shampoo, but Cologne says Shampoo is spoken for and the duel becomes over Akane instead.

titles.title: Enter Mousse! The Fist of the White Swan
白鳥拳の男ムース登場!

REGULAR.description: Conclusion of the four-part Phoenix Pill story. Ranma enters a snow race to get the Phoenix Pill. Can Ranma defeat Cologne for the pill?

titles.title: Cool Runnings! The Race of the Snowmen
La corsa dei pupazzi di neve
爆走! 雪だるま運びレース

REGULAR.description: First part of the three-part martial arts figure skating story. P-chan is taken by Azusa. Ranma and Akane accept a challenge to win him back.
The martial arts ice skating match begins and Mikado insists that he will `steal Akane`s lips` that day.

titles.title: Close Call! The Dance of Death... On Ice!
Tanz des Todes auf dem Eis
危機一髪! 死霊の盆踊り

REGULAR.description: Conclusion of the three-part martial arts figure skating story. Mikado and Azusa use the Couple Cleaver. Ryoga tries to take Ranma`s place.

titles.title: P-chan Explodes! The Icy Fountain of Love!
Pちゃん爆発! 愛の水柱

REGULAR.description: Part one of the two-part breaking point story. Cologne offers to train Ryoga so that he can defeat Ranma. Ranma discovers that Ryoga is learning the `breaking point` technique.
Conclusion of the two-part breaking point story. Ranma trains against Ryoga`s new technque by blocking the stings of bees. Cologne kidnaps Akane to lure Ranma to a duel with Ryoga.

titles.title: Bakusai Tenketsu to wa? Ryouga Daigyakushuu
The Breaking Point!? Ryoga`s Great Revenge
爆砕点穴とは? 良牙大逆襲

REGULAR.description: A dojo destroyer challenges the Tendo Dojo. Shampoo offers Ranma a cure if he`ll date her on that same day, leaving Akane to face the Dojo Destroyer alone.
Mousse abducts Akane and lets Ranma know that if he doesn`t show up for another fight, he`ll splash Akane with that cursed water.
Long recap of Episode 13. Ranma shows up to rescue Akane, but it seems she has been turned into a duck.

titles.title: Ranma vs. Mousse! To Lose Is to Win
対決ムース! 負けるが勝ち

REGULAR.description: Happosai looks for Akane, leaping at all the girls around. Genma hands Ranma over to Happosai to be trained.

titles.title: 究極のエロ妖怪八宝斉

REGULAR.description: First part of the three-part Japanese nannichuan story. Ryoga arrives with a map that should lead to a spring of drowned man in Japan. It turns out to be under the girls` locker room.

titles.title: Assault on the Girl`s Locker Room
Panique dans le vestiaire des filles

REGULAR.description: Cologne tells Ranma he needs two more vases to make the spring return. Ranma goes to look for the second, on the Kuno estate.

titles.title: Kuno`s House of Gadgets! Guests Check In, But They Don`t Check Out
鬼も逃げだすカラクリ屋敷

REGULAR.description: Conclusion of the three-part Japanese nannichuan story. Ranma obtains the second and third vases, then the group sets out for the spring.
Akane and Kodachi both want Ranma to eat their cookies. Kodachi blackmails Ranma with a photo of him in her arms.

titles.title: It`s a Fine Line Between Pleasure and Pain

REGULAR.description: Ranma and Akane team up to put some `girl away` repellant on Happosai`s clothes, driving girls away, and leaving him helpless.
Akane is Juliet in a school play. Ranma, Kuno and Happosai all show up for the role of Romeo and there`s an ongoing battle onstage.

titles.title: Kissing Is Such Sweet Sorrow! The Taking of Akane`s Lips
あかねの口びるを奪え

REGULAR.description: When the Tendo`s water heater breaks, Ranma is called upon to keep an eye on Happosai so the girls can safely visit the public baths.

titles.title: Bathhouse Battle! We`re in Some Hot Water Now
Ii Yu Da na? Sentou de Sentou
いい湯だな? 銭湯で戦闘

REGULAR.description: Akane thinks that the words spoken during a mysterious attack on Genma mean he has an illegitimate son -- Ranma`s half-brother.

titles.title: Mata Hitori Ranma o Aishita Yatsu
また一人 乱馬を愛したヤツ

REGULAR.description: Ukyo tries to set up Ryoga and Akane, to eliminate her as competition for Ranma.

titles.title: 熱愛? 良牙とあかね

REGULAR.description: Shampoo makes special dim sum that has a hypnotic effect on whoever eats it. Ranma ends up hugging anyone that sneezes, and he`s alone with Akane... who is coming down with a cold.

titles.title: Sneeze Me, Squeeze Me, Please Me! Shampoo`s Recipe for Disaster
くしゃみ一発愛してナイト

REGULAR.description: Happosai tries to use the Happo-Fire Burst technique but has forgotten it. The scroll with the technique happens to be at the very same hot springs resort that Akane is currently visiting.

titles.title: Maboroshi no Happou Daikarin o Sagase
Rub-a-Dub-Dub! There`s a Pervert in the Tub
幻の八宝大華輪を探せ

REGULAR.description: Ranma receives a challenge letter from Tsubasa Kurenai. Ranma agrees to a competition selling Ukyo`s food at school, over Ukyo.

titles.title: I Love You! My Dear, Dear Ukyo
大好き! 私のうっちゃん

REGULAR.description: Soun is asked to guard a haunted bra at an antique shop, but Happosai wants it.

titles.title: The Witch Who Loved Me: A Japanese Ghost Story
魔女が愛した下着ドロボー

REGULAR.description: Akane eats Happosai`s super-soba that grants amazing strength. She becomes super-strong, but there are side-effects...

titles.title: Lo spirito e il ladro di biancheria
変身! ムキムキマンあかね

REGULAR.description: The secret Jusenkyo Preservation Society is outraged at violations of their `code of behavior` by spring victims. A big and muscular swordsman, with a curse himself, is sent to bring them to justice.

titles.title: 呪泉郷から来た殺し屋

REGULAR.description: After a fight with Akane, Ranma hits his head on the stone in the pond and thinks he`s really a girl. Girlish Ranma declares that she want to give up martial arts.

titles.title: Am I... Pretty? Ranma`s Declaration of Womanhood
Ranma est tombé sur la tête
Watashi tte Kirei? Ranma Onna Sengen
私ってきれい? 乱馬女宣言

REGULAR.description: Soun and Genma recount training under Chingensai, who taught invisibility. They hope to use the technique against Happosai.

titles.title: Final Facedown! Happosai vs. the Invisible Man
対決! 八宝斉VS透明人間

REGULAR.description: Sasuke is caught in the middle of a feud between Kuno and Kodachi. Akane takes him in as a guest, and he devotes himself to her service for her kindness.

titles.title: Les Miserables of the Kuno Estate
九能家のレ・ミゼラブル

REGULAR.description: Furinkan H.S. is haunted. While searching the school at night, Ranma and company are attacked by a mysterious swordsman.

titles.title: Ghost Story! Ranma and the Magic Sword
Kaidan! Ranma to Mashou no Ken
Storie di spiriti - La spada incantata
怪談! 乱馬と魔性の剣

REGULAR.description: On the beach, Happosai turns up with a bracelet that contains three love-potion pills. One lasts for a minute, one a day and one a lifetime. Akane swallows one.

titles.title: All It Takes Is One! The Kiss of Love Is the Kiss of Death
一粒コロリ・絶倫ホレ薬

REGULAR.description: Mousse talks Ryoga into fighting together against Ranma.

titles.title: Shijou Saikyou? Ryouga to Mousse Doumei
史上最強? 良牙とムース同盟

REGULAR.description: Happosai tries to sell some of his old stuff, which includes a magic mirror. It can allow travel to any time the user thinks about.

titles.title: バック・トゥ・ザ・八宝斉

REGULAR.description: The dojo is running low on food. Ranma goes out, trying to bring in students to the dojo, but Kodachi creates a competing dojo.

titles.title: Kodachi the Black Rose! The Beeline of True Love
黒バラの小太刀! 純愛一直線

REGULAR.description: The class fortune-teller, Miyo, foresees that Akane and Ranma will be married within the week. Happosai falls ill and seems to be dying.
Two of the girls from Shampoo`s tribe come to help kill Ranma, because Shampoo hasn`t managed to yet.

titles.title: Lin Lin e Lan Lan le combina guai
Two, Too Violent Girls: Ling-Ling & Lung-Lung
暴れん坊娘 リンリンランラン

REGULAR.description: Happosai uses a special technique to split Ranma in two. His girl side turns into a life-draining spirit in love with the boy side.

titles.title: Ranma o Osou Kyoufu no Tatari
Ranma und der Feind im Inneren
乱馬を襲う恐怖のタタリ

REGULAR.description: The imposter Ken comes along, impersonating Ranma and the others. Ranma, Mousse, Ryoga and Kuno team up and train together.

titles.title: Enter Ken and His Copycat Kerchief
登場! ものまね格闘技

REGULAR.description: Ryoga finds Shampoo`s waterproof soap, that keeps Jusenkyo curses from being activated. Not fearing changing into a pig, he asks Akane for a date.

titles.title: Ryoga`s Miracle Cure! Hand Over That Soap
良牙の体質改善セッケン!

REGULAR.description: The first prize in an obstacle course race is an all-expense-paid trip to China. All of the cursed characters enter so they can return to Jusenkyo.

titles.title: Fight! The Anything-Goes Obstacle Course Race
La corsa di lotta ad ostacoli
格闘! 障害物レース

REGULAR.description: Happosai`s magic mirror is used to send Genma, Ranma and Happosai into the future, and then back to Jusenkyo before falling into the springs.

titles.title: Ranma Goes Back to Jusenkyo At Last
Ranma et la source de l`incantation
Ranma, Tsui ni Jusenkyou e Iku
乱馬, ついに呪泉郷へ行く

REGULAR.description: Furinkan High`s principal returns from a long trip to "study" American educational system, unfortunately he turns out to be completely insane. His first order of business is to institute a policy of buzz cuts for boys and bowl cuts for girls unless the students can find the coconut with a "get out of rules free" note in it...

titles.title: The Return of the Hawaiian Headmaster from Hell

REGULAR.description: To help him carry out his new position as Furinkan High`s Moral Guardian, Kuno turns to Happosai for training.

titles.title: Ritter Kuno ohne Fehl und Tadel
登場! 史上最強の九能

REGULAR.description: Furious at Ranma for delivering him into the hands of a mob of angry women, Happosai brands Ranma with ancient mark, causing him to become "as weak as a mere babe". Upon hearing this, his enemies start lining up to give him a beating... What`s poor Ranma to do?

titles.title: 乱馬が弱くなっちゃった!

REGULAR.description: Just as Ranma is about to give up, Cologne gives him hope in the form of the "Hiryu Shoten Ha", a devastating technique he can use even in his weakened state... if he can manage to learn it.

titles.title: Eureka! The Desperate Move of Desperation
完成! とんでもない必殺技

REGULAR.description: Armed with the "Hiryu Shoten Ha", Ranma goes after Happosai. But the old master, knowing something is up, keeps his temper, rendering the attack useless unless Ranma can figure out some way to get him really worked up...

titles.title: Showdown! Can Ranma Make a Comeback?
決戦! 乱馬復活なるか?

REGULAR.description: When Ukyo comes to school dressed as a girl, Kuno takes an interest. Ukyo ends up in a cooking contest with Shampoo, Kodachi and Akane.

titles.title: Ukyo`s Skirt! The Great Girly-Girl Gambit
右京のスカート大作戦!

REGULAR.description: A mysterious woman shows up at the Dojo, having long conversations with Genma. Is it really Ranma`s mother, come to take him away to live with her?

titles.title: 乱馬のママがやってきた!

REGULAR.description:
Ryoga has a dream about Akane while spending the night in a cabin in the woods after getting lost. Ryoga reminisces about Ranma, how he`s come to transform into a pig, and how his feelings for Akane have grown over time.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Ryouga, Ai to Kunou o Koete
良牙, 愛と苦悩を越えて

REGULAR.description: Shampoo shows up with an oversized bell for Ranma, claiming it`ll make them fated to stay together forever. The bell however turns out be cursed, carrying the spirit of Maomorin - the giant ghost cat, looking for his bride.
The Principal hires a new teacher, who takes it upon himself to get Ranma and Akane to openly express their feelings towards each other while they`re still young.

titles.title: Blow, Wind! To Be Young Is to Go Gung-Ho
Fuke yo Kaze! Seishun wa Nekketsu Da
吹けよ風! 青春は熱血だ

REGULAR.description: A young man is awestruck when he sees Happosai in action, and seeks out the Tendo Dojo, wishing to become a student of Anything Goes Martial Arts. The master accepts, and it soon becomes apparent that he`s a very dedicated pupil... at bit too dedicated if you ask Ranma.

titles.title: 恐るべき新弟子現わる

REGULAR.description: Off to the mountains to find a Christmas tree for the Master, Ranma and Genma become separated. When Ranma and Akane go looking for him, they find him living in luxury as a panda, having been adopted by a rich woman as a playmate for her sickly son.

titles.title: Le petit garçon et le panda

REGULAR.description: Ryoga decides to try to enroll at Furinkan High, though first he has to pass the placement test. Akane agrees to tutor him, but with all the commotion that happens in the Tendo Dojo on a regular basis, can he manage to keep his mind on his studies?

titles.title: Roland, le nouveau membre de la famille
Ryouga no Tendou Doujou Isourou Nikki
良牙の天道道場居候日記

REGULAR.description: Happosai falls head over heels in love with a pre-school teacher, but is he willing to give up the underwear stealing for her sake?

A fortunetelling friend of Sasuke`s divines that Nabiki is the girl Tatewaki is destined to spend his life with. Still torn over having to abandon Akane and "the pig-tailed girl", Kuno starts to court Nabiki, who naturally welcomes the opportunity to milk him for everything he`s worth.

titles.title: Extra, Extra! Kuno & Nabiki: Read All About It!
九能ボー然! 恋の大予言

REGULAR.description: After sharing his food with an old hermit, the man repays Ryoga by making him the strongest man in the world. But is it worth the price?

Terrified that Akane has figured out that he`s really P-Chan, Ryoga tries to leave the town forever. Ranma continues to try to figure out a way to beat Ryoga, while Akane tries to force him to tell her what he knows about the mark shared by Ryoga and P-Chan.

titles.title: あやうし! Pちゃんの秘密

REGULAR.description: Kasumi seems unusually cheerful after a chance encounter with a stranger, leading Nabiki to speculate that she`s found herself a new boyfriend.
Kuno`s got a magic sword capable of granting 3 wishes, and Ranma smells a cure for his curse. The "upperclassman" has already used two of them... How far is Ranma willing to go to get the third?

titles.title: Ranma to Kunou no Hatsu Kiss?!
らんまと九能の初キッス?!

REGULAR.description: Ranma suddenly falls head over heels for Shampoo when she ties him to her with the magical Red Thread of Fate. Just a few more hours and the effect will be permanent, and Akane doesn`t care one bit... does she?

After betting it all on a final fight with Ranma, Mousse loses and is forced to give up on Shampoo and go home to China. But before he leaves, he`s determined to make Shampoo happy by forcing Ranma to give up his other suitors.

titles.title: Mousse Goes Home to the Country

REGULAR.description: 10 years ago, Ranma gambled away the Tendo Dojo. Now the "Gambling King" has come to collect, and Ranma has to win it back. However, in spite of his name, the King is so bad at gambling he only manages to beat children. Sadly, that provides little comfort as Ranma`s even worse...

titles.title: Le plus grand tricheur de tous les temps

REGULAR.description: Azusa becomes convinced Kuno is a tanuki, a legendary creature with magical powers, and promptly adopts him as her "Marianne". Ranma and Akane are just happy that the two are keeping each other busy, until Azusa starts to suspect Akane wants to take her new pet away form her again.

titles.title: マリアンヌになった九能

REGULAR.description: Akane runs away after Ranma ruins her anniversary dinner, and the entire household has to spend the rest of the night looking for her.

titles.title: Ranma, You Are Such a Jerk!

REGULAR.description: Why are there strange small men running around chopping off people`s pigtails? And what`s the Dragon Whisker? What is Ranma hiding...?

titles.title: Il s`en est fallu d`un cheveu (1)
そのおさげ もらったぁ!

REGULAR.description: Ranma gets no peace at all, as everyone`s after the Dragon Whisker. Things get even more tense as he learns that if he doesn`t get it back soon, he might just run out of hair - permanently.

titles.title: Otoko no Yabou ga Tsukiru Toki...
When a Guy`s Pride and Joy Is Gone

REGULAR.description: Honorbound to remain single until their big sister marries, Ling-Ling and Lung-Lung return to Japan armed with an even deadlier technique, determined to eliminate all of Ranma`s other fiancées.

titles.title: リンリン・ランランの逆襲

REGULAR.description: After being saved from a pack of wolves by Ryoga, the Ghost Cat decides to repay the debt by possessing him and proposing to Akane.
After a disagreement over the rules oh Shogi, tensions between Soun and Genma rise, until Genma moves out of the Dojo, taking Ranma with him...

Ranma is kidnapped by Sentaro - a practitioner of Martial Arts Tea Ceremony, looking for a bride. To determine the bride`s suitability, she has to defeat his grandmother, and as usual, Ranma`s completely incapable of walking away from a challenge.

titles.title: Kore ga Kakutou Sadou de Omasu
The Gentle Art of Martial Tea Ceremony
これが格闘茶道でおます

REGULAR.description: A mysterious gang of martial artist using old fashion toys as weapons are about, and one of them, a young girl, challenges Akane for the Dojo`s sign... and wins. Can Akane manage to win it back?

titles.title: And the Challenger Is... a Girl?!

REGULAR.description: A hotsprings resort is having a big obstacle course race as a PR gimmick, with the first prize being a trip to another resort of the contestants choice. Seeing a chance to get back to Jusenkyo, the whole gang enters, unaware that the resort is trying their best to stop anyone from winning, since they`re broke and can`t afford to pay for the prize...

When the Principal starts going on about his long lost son, Sasuke starts to have his suspicions. But can get to the bottom of this as the school is turned into a war zone by the Principal`s "Get out of all school rules" class tournament fight.

titles.title: Me Is Kuno`s Daddy, Me Is
Me ga Kunou no Daddy Desu
ミーが九能のダディです

REGULAR.description: Sentaro need`s Ranma`s assistance once more, as the Daimonji matriarch prepares to do something so dangerous, so unpreceded, that the result is sure to be catastrophic...

Out to prove that martial arts rhythmic gymnastics is a manly sport for manly man-like men, a group of boys are stealing the local team`s special gymnastics treasures. Naturally, it`s up to Ranma to strike a blow for womankind and get the treasures back.

titles.title: A Leotard Is a Girl`s Burden
レオタードは乙女の呪い

REGULAR.description: An invitation takes Ranma and the rest to a run-down hot-springs resort. But what are those strange noises in the bathhouse... Is it really haunted?
A strange old man with a small army of pet frogs comes to town, and he`s keeping his eyes on Ranma. Is it really the Frog Hermit, and mysterious stranger with the ability to turn people into frogs?

titles.title: カエルのうらみはらします

REGULAR.description: When a crêpes cook steals all her business, Ukyo starts to doubt her prowess as an Okonomiyaki maker. Under the guidance of a monk from the Temple of the Satisfied Stomach, she beings an intense training program, leaving Ranma and Akane to mind the store...

titles.title: 逆襲! 怒りのお好み焼き

REGULAR.description: Under the influence of a magic bandage, Ranma starts hitting on every girl in sight, and Ukyo and Shampoo are determined to remain within his field of vision.

A master of the mysterious martial art of Battle Shogi seeks out Genma, demanding a rematch for the defeat that cost him the respect of his wife. When Genma "wins" again, the man decides to turn the entire lawn into a gigantic Shogi board...
Dissatisfied with Sasuke`s performance as protector of the household, Kuno gives him a final chance to prove himself - arrange a date with the pig-tailed girl.

titles.title: L`espion qui venait de nulle part

REGULAR.description: A french nobleman comes to Soun and Genma to collect on an old debt, demanding one of their daughters as a bride. Having been beaten by him at "battle dining" previously, Ranma volunteers, hoping for a chance to get even.

titles.title: ボンジュールでございます

REGULAR.description: With the wedding date fast approaching, Ranma`s only hope is to master the fearsome Parley du Foie Gras and beat Picolet at battle dining.

titles.title: Dinner wa Ring no Ue de
ディナーはリングの上で

REGULAR.description: Akane is chosen to represent the the school in the regional swimming contest, not telling anyone she doesn`t know how. Luckily, the Principal is there to "help" her learn.

titles.title: あかね, 涙の水泳大特訓

REGULAR.description: While out on one of his journeys, Ryoga gets taken in by a farmer and his daughter who`s convinced he`s the legendary hero "Joe", come to save them from the crooks that have been terrorizing the area.

titles.title: 良牙! 夕日に向かって走れ

REGULAR.description: Something strange is in the air, as one by one the members of the Tendo household fall asleep and enter a twisted dream world controlled by Happosai.
Furious at both Ranma and Nabiki, Akane tells them to go marry each other. Much to her surprise, Nabiki decides to her younger sister up on the offer.
Everyone is a suspect as the denizens of the Tendo Dojo try to figure out which of them ate the newly bought box of delicious octopus puffs.

titles.title: 天道家消えたたこ焼きの謎

REGULAR.description: Ranma buys a magical incense supposed to let him increase his skills by training against his own shadow. At first it works great, but then it becomes apparent that the shadow has a mind of it`s own.
Kodachi is shocked to learn that the Principal is her father. When she invites him to stay at the Kuno residence, the scene is set for her brother`s worst nightmare.

titles.title: 小太刀のマイラブリーパパ

REGULAR.description: While trying to save him from one of Akane`s lunches, Ranma inadvertently becomes the object of the wrath of one Hikaru Gosunkugi... the most incompetent Voodoo-practicing geek the world has ever seen.

titles.title: 強敵? 五寸釘くん登場

REGULAR.description: A master of martial arts calligraphy is about, so far undefeated. Naturally, Ranma wants to change that, but finds it difficult when the man will only accept challenges from people with beautiful handwriting.

titles.title: 乱馬はヘタクソ? 格闘書道

REGULAR.description: Deep within the bowels of Furinkan High, Ranma discovers a second school store, run by a crazy old man with a secret the Principal is desperate to keep from getting out.

titles.title: Fuurinkan Koukou, Kage no Don Toujou
The Secret Don of Furinkan High
風林館高校, 影のドン登場

REGULAR.description: Ranma, Ryoga and Mousse each get a bag of magic powder. One of them is capable of curing their curse - the others can turn them into anything...

titles.title: Back to the Way We Were... Please!
Higan! Futsuu no Otoko ni Modoritai
悲願! 普通の男に戻りたい

REGULAR.description: Furious at Ranma for eating his sweets, Genma decides to make Ryoga his disciple and heir.

titles.title: 早乙女流の跡継ぎは良牙?

REGULAR.description: Dr. Tofo gets a free pass to an amusement park and invites Kasumi, who takes the rest of household with her. Once there, the money starts flying, and suddenly they discover that an unwanted guest has eaten their lunch.

titles.title: Tendo Family Goes to the Amusement Park!
天道家, 遊園地へ行く

REGULAR.description: A masked man sporting a black pigtail is stalking the girls of Furinkan at night, with Ranma being the prime suspect.

titles.title: 風林館高校・通り魔事件

REGULAR.description: Akane is kidnapped by a pantyhose wielding youth capable of turning it to huge winged monster.

titles.title: The Demon from Jusenkyo, Part I
呪泉郷から来た悪魔 前編

REGULAR.description: There`s water everywhere as Ranma, Ryoga, Shampoo and Mousse try to take Taro`s cliff top hideout and save Akane.

titles.title: The Demon from Jusenkyo, Part II
呪泉郷から来た悪魔 後編

REGULAR.description: Ranma isn`t home yet due to an important business and Akane goes out looking for him. Shampoo, Kodachi and Ukyo end up looking for him to because they want to spend Christmas Eve with Ranma alone.
After a night of sudden snowfall, Ryoga shows on the Tendo`s doorstep, half frozen to death and rambling about a giant snow monster.
While fighting with his father over a takoyaki, Ranma accidently sets free three unspeakably evil spirits, one of which is a living panda doodle that wants a date with him.

titles.title: らくがきパンダの呪い

REGULAR.description: Kuno washes up on the beach, with a watermelon on his head and suffering from amnesia.
While out in the wilderness, Genma falls into a river and hits his head. When he wakes up he finds himself in an earlier time, near a village inhabited by familiar faces.

After 10 whole years of fermentation, it`s finally time for Ukyo to try out the special okonomiyaki sauce she made as a child. Unfourtunaly it tastes so horrible that she collapses, and the Tendos take her in while she recovers. While she`s there, Akane grows increasingly jealous, especially since Ranma is going out of his way to be nice to someone he claims he just sees as a childhood friend...

titles.title: Ranma to Ukyou ga Sauce Souai?
乱馬と右京がソース相愛?

REGULAR.description: Trying to keep Ukyo off his back, Ranma goes along with Nibiki`s plan, pretending that he and Akane are already married. She`s not the kind of girl who gives up easily however, forcing the "newlyweds" to keep up the charade around the clock.
Sentaro shows up fearing for his life, wanting Ranma`s help to rescue his kidnapped grandmother.

titles.title: The Missing Matriarch of Martial Arts Tea!
格闘茶道! さらわれた家元

REGULAR.description: Distracted by Ranma scuffling with Gosunkugi, Akane gets a bone fracture during gym class and has to spend the next few days in Dr. Tofu`s clinic. Everyone comes to visit her... except Ranma, who just can`t decide what he`s going to say to her.

titles.title: 大変! あかねが入院した

REGULAR.description: Soun, Genma and Ranma are hired to rid a seaside resort of the nasty marauding octopus pot that has been terrorizing the guests.

titles.title: Mystery of the Marauding Octopus Pot!
謎の暴れタコツボ現る?!

REGULAR.description: Gosunkugi sees a chance for a date with Akane when he obtains a set of magic paper dolls, capable of forcing someone to obey whatever command is written on them when they`re stuck to the individual`s back.

titles.title: 五寸釘! あぁ恋の紙人形

REGULAR.description: A young boy capable of reading people`s minds shows up at the Dojo, but gets upset when nobody believes in his talent, and starts taking it out on Ranma.

titles.title: Le garçon qui lisait dans les pensées
あかねの心がわからない

REGULAR.description: When Akane reads out aloud words of an old notebook in Toramasa`s store, the ghost of a teenage girl appears, reciting a haunting rhyme.

titles.title: 追跡! 手まり唄の謎

REGULAR.description: Happosai`s plan to teach Ranma some manners backfires, when the magic pill he took makes them stick togeter - litteraly.

titles.title: もうあなたから離れない

REGULAR.description: Aloha the Principle decides he needs a vacation. He leaves Kuno on in charge not because Kuno is his son (so he says), but to give Kuno the opportunity to show responsibility. Kuno declares himself a champion of virtue. He runs into some trouble trying to enforce a school rule of no close personal relationships between sexes on school grounds.

titles.title: Kunou Tatewaki, Dairi Kouchou o Meizu
九能帯刀, 代理校長を命ず

REGULAR.description: Ranma and Happosai team up to conquer the Ogre Festival of the Dark. Happosai prepares Ranma personally for the match of his life. If Ranma loses The Ogre Festival of the Dark it will be the end of the Anything-Goes School of Indescriminate Grappling. Winning the tourney, the true horror of the situation is revealed.

titles.title: 乱馬, 月夜に吠える

REGULAR.description: The Jusenkyo guide shows up in Japan! He will perform a ceremony which will tap the water table that is the source of the "Spring of Drowned Man" to where there is a new Jusenkyo spring in Japan! Where is that spring? Naturally, it`s the pond directly outside the Tendo dining room.

titles.title: 你好[ニーハオ]!呪泉郷のガイドさん

REGULAR.description: A pack of magical, powerful cards has fallen into the wrong hands, and now Happosai is several times as much a pain as before! It was bad enough when there was just one of him - now there are six!

titles.title: 迷惑! 六人の八宝斉

REGULAR.description: Shishi Hoko-Dan… the Lion`s Roar Blast! Better than the construction specific "Breaking Point" technique (which worked only on rocks), Ryoga`s new move has got Ranma on the run. Can he get away fast enough?

titles.title: From the Depths of Despair, Part I
気分しだいの必殺技 (前)

REGULAR.description: To perfect the dangerous Shishi Hoko-Dan technique, one must travel to the depths of despair. Where Ryoga lives most of the time anyway! But why is Ranma trying to make Ryoga even more miserable?!

titles.title: From the Depths of Despair, Part II
気分しだいの必殺技 (後)

REGULAR.description: "Be my bri-i-i-i-i-de----!!" It`s been awhile, but at last the "Ghost Cat" has come back... and he won`t release Shampoo until she agrees to marry him! Can Ranma prevent the "cat`s trophy"?

titles.title: シャンプー囚われのキッス

REGULAR.description: A recurring dream...a romantic couple...their destiny, somehow tied to the blooming cherry blossoms. Ranma gets roped into helping a ghost "have not regrets" before shuffling off this mortal coil. But the ties that bind can be stubborn...

titles.title: ボクと駆け落ちして下さい

REGULAR.description: "The soul of the mushroom is the soul of the Earth," or so it`s said by those in the know. Love mushrooms... poison mushrooms... can a relationship based on fungus survive among us?

titles.title: Let`s Go to the Mushroom Temple

REGULAR.description: In the life of every father, there must eventually come a time when the son challenges his authority, tests his own strength, declares himself a man. But is Cup Ramen worth losing your dad for?

titles.title: 必殺! 地獄のゆりかご

REGULAR.description: A vat of forbidden, blue wine is having a strange effect on Picolet Chardin, that memorable, masterful monsieur of martial-arts dining. Fearing for her charge, Madame St. Paul askes for help...though she may wish she hadn`t.

titles.title: Madam St. Paul`s Cry for Help
青い恐怖にボンジュール

REGULAR.description: Held every year on July 7th, Japan`s "tanabata" festival celebrates the celestial reunion of the Weaver Princess and her beau, the Cowherd. When the two descend from the sky, their story seems suddenly so much less romantic....

titles.title: Meet You in the Milky Way
織姫は流れ星に乗って

REGULAR.description: It is said, if he who eats of the "cherry blossom rice-cake" is meant to be with you forever, the mark of the sakura shall appear on his forehead, but if he is not....

titles.title: 一つ召しませ恋の桜餅

REGULAR.description: Happosai`s always relied on his "Happo Fire-Burst" technique to get what he want, but on rainy days its lost efectiveness, so he discover a new ultimate "mold" weapon ....

titles.title: できた! 八宝大カビン

REGULAR.description: Oh those wacky, squabbling, Kuno siblings. Tatewaki (age seventeen) is in love with girl-type Ranma, while Kodachi (a.k.a "the Black Rose") adores the boy-type. Brought to blows by jealousy, where`s King Solomon where you need him?

titles.title: 九能兄妹スキャンダルの嵐

REGULAR.description: Once again, it`s return of Martial Arts Tea Ceremony master, Sentaro. The whole incident seems to be over some treasured tea set that rival schools have fought over for generations, and now it`s Sentaro`s turn to prove his worth!

titles.title: Battle for the Golden Tea Set!
Ougon no Chaki, Gojuunotou no Kessen
黄金の茶器, 五重塔の決戦

REGULAR.description: The ever-so-morose Hikaru Gosunkugi has met the girl of his dreams. The weird thing is, she even seems to like him back! The trouble is, the girl is Kogane, the teenage ghost. What can Ranma and Akane possibly do to make this ghostly love story work?

titles.title: 五寸釘光, ひと夏の恋

REGULAR.description: Having learned (or been the victim of) almost any martial-arts style imaginable, Ranma`s never-the-less about to learn a whole new one: Martial-Arts Cheerleading! Mariko Konjo, pep leader extraordinaire, is fixing to put a hurt on Akane... and Ranma can`t allow that. But is he willing to pick up a pair of pom-poms to stop her?

titles.title: Bring It On! Love as a Cheerleader, Part 1
愛の格闘チアガール (前)

REGULAR.description: Ranma`s got the basic moves down, sure, and that uniform really is cute, but then it turns out that it`s Kuno`s kendo match he has to cheer for. No way! Worse, Mariko`s crush on the so-called "Blue Thunder" means the only way Ranma can win-and avenge Akane`s honor-is to somehow best Mariko in a cheerleading contest. Under these circumstances, how cheerful can Ranma be expected to be?!

titles.title: Bring It On! Love as a Cheerleader, Part 2
愛の格闘チアガール (後)

REGULAR.description: This is like no bathing-suit competition you`ve ever seen! The contestants are Akane, Shampoo, Ukyo and Kodachi ... plus girl-type Ranma, and Tsubasa Kurenai to boot. Knowing these girls, it`s going to be one hot competition!

titles.title: 決定! ミス・ビーチサイド

REGULAR.description: During an annual cleaning of the estate, Kuno comes across an ancient taiko drum that`s got the devasting power of a howitzer. And what good is a weapon if you don`t turn it on your friends, right? As if that weren`t enough, now Kodachi`s got an equally devastating lute...which she promptly turns over to the principal. Cue the music!

titles.title: 爆裂! ハイパーツヅミ

REGULAR.description: Big trouble for Ryoga when a dog he saved repays him by delivering a love letter to Akane. A letter he didn`t mean to send.

titles.title: A Ninja`s Dog Is Black and White
Shinobi no Inu wa Shiro to Kuro

REGULAR.description: Ranma and Akane find a seahorse looking thing and they take it back to the dojo. Dr Tofu says that this seahorse thing will grow into a dragon with awesome powers so now there are those who want it.
Genma receives a note from Nadoka, his wife and Ranma`s mother, that she is coming over to the Tendo`s for a visit. But why is Genma so terrified?

titles.title: 乱馬, ミーツ・マザー

REGULAR.description: Ranma is Ranma-Chan and Genma is a big panda so they do get to see Ranma`s mom. After a few days she decides it`s time to leave but Akane won`t let this happen. With Genma distracted she arranges for Ranma to meet his mom.

titles.title: Boy Meets Mom, Part 2: Someday, Somehow...
いつの日か, きっと...
天道家のおよびでない奴ら!
らんま1/2 DoCoミュージックビデオ
We Love Ranma 1/2 Part 1: Manga Remastering with Us Editor
We Love Ranma 1/2 Part 2: Favorite Scenes
We Love Ranma 1/2 Part 3: The Appeal of Ranma 1/2
We Love Ranma 1/2 Part 4: We Love Cosplay
We Love Ranma 1/2 Part 5: We Love Collection
We Love Ranma 1/2 Part 6: We Love Working on Ranma 1/2
We Love Ranma 1/2 Part 8: We Love Rumiko Takahashi
New York Comic Con Cosplay Gathering
ラヴ・シーカー CAN`T STOP IT
AD Limited Edition Blu-ray Box Set

2996.name: journey to the center of the mind
